languages.text: Один из часовых, явившись к Лорд-капитану, с испугом в голосе доложил, что видел в темноте странную массивную тень... И это определенно не был Ульфар Громогласный.
One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.
languages.original_text: Один из часовых, явившись к Лорд-капитану, с испугом в голосе доложил, что видел в темноте странную массивную тень... И это определенно не был Ульфар Громогласный.

traits.locale_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.
One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

languages.text: 一位哨兵焦急地向舰长大人报告，说他在黑暗中看到了某个巨大的黑影……但那个人绝对不是乌尔法·雷狼。
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: 一位哨兵焦急地向舰长大人报告，说他在黑暗中看到了某个巨大的黑影……但那个人绝对不是乌尔法·雷狼。

languages.text: 見張りのひとりが気がかりな報告をロード・キャプテンに伝える。闇の中で巨大な影を見たという…明らかにウルファー・サンダーラングのものではない、とも。
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: 見張りのひとりが気がかりな報告をロード・キャプテンに伝える。闇の中で巨大な影を見たという…明らかにウルファー・サンダーラングのものではない、とも。

languages.text: Uno de los guardias informa nervioso al{mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán: ha visto una sombra gigante en la oscuridad... y claramente no se trataba de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador.
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los guardias informa nervioso al{mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán: ha visto una sombra gigante en la oscuridad... y claramente no se trataba de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador.

languages.text: Une sentinelle fait un rapport inquiétant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} : une ombre imposante aurait été aperçue dans l'obscurité... et il ne s'agissait pas d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre.
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: Une sentinelle fait un rapport inquiétant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} : une ombre imposante aurait été aperçue dans l'obscurité... et il ne s'agissait pas d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre.

languages.text: Eine der Wachen meldet dem Lord Captain aufgeregt, sie habe in der Dunkelheit einen großen Schatten gesehen ... und es war definitiv nicht Ulfar Donnerlunge.
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: Eine der Wachen meldet dem Lord Captain aufgeregt, sie habe in der Dunkelheit einen großen Schatten gesehen ... und es war definitiv nicht Ulfar Donnerlunge.

languages.text: Nöbetçilerden biri Lord Kaptan'a endişe verici bir rapor sunuyor. Karanlıkta devasa bir gölge görmüş... Bu gölge, kesinlikle Ulfar Tufanciğer değilmiş.
languages.original_text: One of the sentries delivers an anxious report to the Lord Captain: he has seen a massive shadow in the darkness... and it was definitely not Ulfar Thunderlung.

traits.locale_text: Nöbetçilerden biri Lord Kaptan'a endişe verici bir rapor sundu. Karanlıkta devasa bir gölge görmüştü ve bu gölge kesinlikle Ulfar Tufanciğer'in değildi.
